name: Brownsberg Nature Park
description: Explore Brownsberg Nature Park, a pristine rainforest reserve with hiking trails, waterfalls, and the opportunity to spot diverse wildlife.

name: Galibi Nature Reserve
description: Visit the Galibi Nature Reserve to witness the nesting of sea turtles, including giant leatherbacks, and experience indigenous culture.

name: Paramaribo's Historic District
description: Explore the historic district of Paramaribo, a UNESCO World Heritage site, with its colonial architecture and vibrant street life.

name: Central Suriname Nature Reserve
description: Embark on an adventure in the Central Suriname Nature Reserve, one of the world's largest pristine tropical rainforests, offering hiking and wildlife encounters.

name: Brokopondo Reservoir Boat Tour
description: Take a boat tour on the Brokopondo Reservoir, created by the Afobaka Dam, and enjoy scenic views, fishing, and water-based activities.

name: Maroon Village Experience
description: Immerse yourself in the culture of Maroon villages, such as Danpaati, and learn about the history, traditions, and music of the Maroon people.

name: Tafelberg Mountain Trek
description: Embark on a challenging trek to Tafelberg Mountain, a flat-topped plateau with stunning views, unique flora, and diverse ecosystems.

name: Galibi-Matiwai Indigenous Experience
description: Experience indigenous culture in Galibi-Matiwai, interact with local communities, and enjoy river excursions and nature walks.

name: Warappa Creek Bike Tour
description: Take a bike tour along the scenic Warappa Creek, passing through old plantations, picturesque landscapes, and historical sites.

name: Blanche Marie Waterfalls
description: Discover the remote Blanche Marie Waterfalls, located in the western rainforest, and enjoy the beauty of cascading water and lush surroundings.
